$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We have a massive emergency on
our hands! A force of unknown origin
and incredible size is invading!$k$pAs we speak, Askr stands in danger
of being overrun. Rouse yourselves—
this is no training exercise!$k$pEarly estimates suggest they number
in the tens of millions!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Did you say tens of MILLIONS? Are
you quite sure the figures didn't get
mixed up?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|To think an army of this size could
exist, let alone appear as if from
nowhere... It's staggering.$k$pEven if a gate were to open, how
could a force so large emerge so
quickly? And how do we fight it?$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo500,255,255,0,128|$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|$Fi500|You have a keen insight, Prince
Alfonse of Askr...he who can open
the gateways to the realms.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|You are?$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|My name is Thórr. Mortals have long
called me the god of war.$k$pI have been commanded to deliver a
verdict upon you. I shall strike
humankind with Mjölnir's full might.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Mjölnir...?$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|The divine hammer that I wield,
which delivers judgment.$k$pIn just a few days' time, my forces
will grind your army into dust, and
the people of Askr along with them.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|You dare?$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|I see a fire burning in your eyes,
young prince. You do not intend
to back down from my challenge.$k$pMake for the south, then. There
you will find a shield that can
withstand Mjölnir's wrath.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|What do you mean by "a shield"?$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|Long ago, the humans of Midgard
built a stronghold to house treasures
they collected from other worlds...$k$pIt has become known as "Midgard's
Shield"—a fitting name for the bastion
awaiting the clash of my hammer.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I mislike this. What would motivate
you to share such information with
your avowed foe?$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|An opponent is due proper respect.
Wanton slaughter is not my aim.$k$pWar is a forge that shapes the mortal
spirit. I must observe how you meet
this challenge.$k$pMortals live and die by the sword.
The need you have to test yourselves
exceeds even that of the gods.$k$pI have no desire to destroy you, but I
have been given a task that I shall
execute with all diligence.$k$pI anticipate that you shall meet me
with utmost force. Anything less,
and you stand no chance.$k$pGather your Heroes at the Shield, and
we shall see which shatters first: your
citadel, or my Mjölnir.$k$p
